alert.note: Alert for Chinati Mountains; Davis Mountains; Eastern Culberson County; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 04 at 3:04AM CDT until April 04 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ THIS MORNING TO 11 PM CDT /10 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Eddy County Plains, and Northern Lea and Central Lea Counties. In Texas, Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor, Eastern Culberson County, and Chinati and Davis Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ Tuesday. For the High Wind Warning, from 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ to 11 PM CDT /10 PM MDT/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Chinati Mountains; Davis Mountains; Eastern Culberson County; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor
